name: uncleaned
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
not cleaned: The frying pan was still uncleaned from breakfast. Once the food is cooked, do not let it touch any uncleaned surface it touched when raw.
More examplesFewer examplesWe moved the plates from the previous customers onto an empty uncleaned table.Hospital staff admitted that equipment is routinely left uncleaned. Once you have finished cooking on your barbeque, never leave it uncleaned.She was very aware of her dirty old jacket, her ripped jeans, and her uncleaned shoes.
